name: Pain Train Painpocalypse Wall Paper Set
detailed_description:
Pain Train Painpocalypse Wallpaper Set


A collection of high quality, high resolution wall papers. Wall papers vary in sizes and are up to 5184x3456 resolution in JPEG format.

FEATURES:
10 High Quality Wall Papers
High Resolution Images
JPEG Format

After installing this DLC, a folder titled DLC Wall Papers will appear in your Pain Train Painpocalypse app folder. This will contain the 10 high resolution Wall Papers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Процессор: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Оперативная память: 500 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
